titles.title: To prohibit a State from imposing a discriminatory commuter tax on nonresidents, and for other purposes.
To prohibit a State from imposing a discriminatory commuter tax on nonresidents, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Prohibits a state from imposing a tax on the income earned in the state by nonresidents unless the tax is of substantial equality of treatment for the citizens of the state and the nonresidents so commuting.
